snippet: Relatives of 11 of the children and adults killed at Sandy Hook Elementary School have formed a group to join the national debate.
abstract: Relatives of 11 of the victims of the massacre at Sandy Hook Elementary School in Newtown, Conn, have formed nonprofit group Sandy Hook Promise, calling for a national debate on what they describe as 'gun responsibility'; perhaps foreshadowing  difficult and contentious debates to come in Washington, group members decline to offer support for any specific measures, emphasizing that the debate must be broader than gun control.
lead_paragraph: Relatives of 11 of the children and adults killed at Sandy Hook Elementary School have formed a group to join the national debate.
